name: BMW R5
description: The BMW R1200GS and R1200GS Adventure are motorcycles manufactured in Berlin, Germany by BMW Motorrad, part of the BMW group.

name: Ferrari LaFerrari
description: the Ferrari LaFerrari is actually one of the most affordable supercars on this list. It’s a bargain compared to the most expensive vehicle.

name: Pagani Huayra
description: Inarguably one of the prettiest cars on this list, the Pagani Huayra cost a cool $1.4 million when new. It's realy cool.

name: Bugatti Bolide
